title: banned 4 one game xD
body:
AetherKingdom: blitz cancer incoming 
AetherKingdom: fuck man
AetherKingdom: i got scared
AetherKingdom: i couldve easy killed u
AetherKingdom: LUL
AetherKingdom: alirght
AetherKingdom: open mid
AetherKingdom: games done
AetherKingdom: yelp
AetherKingdom: its gg
AetherKingdom: just let them
AetherKingdom: end
AetherKingdom: .
AetherKingdom: i didnt know xerath plays to even be in auto range (: (xerath int trolling me by taking rift herald buff while im playing rengar, trying real hard at this point not to be toxic towards people )
AetherKingdom: agree
AetherKingdom: ff
AetherKingdom: y say gg if ur not gonna ff
AetherKingdom: can not win
AetherKingdom: for not doing that autistic baron call (lucian starts spamming report me and i get mad xD)
AetherKingdom: hang urself nigeria ( bypassing boards censor here)
AetherKingdom: first toxic thing ive said except ff
AetherKingdom: but
AetherKingdom: ok
AetherKingdom: if you wanna lose now
AetherKingdom: i can afk
AetherKingdom: gg
AetherKingdom: im being reported anyways
AetherKingdom: im forcing loss then
AetherKingdom: die irl

replies.body:
You threatened to afk, told people to commit suicide, used hate speech, called people autistic, assisted the enemy team....

Yeah I can definately see you being escalated several tiers. Personally were I the one to review your case I would perma from this one game as well (even if you were never punished before).
thing is i prob wouldve still been banned had i not said a thing. thats how riot banning system works. retards who have no game sense report you for not being autistic and you get punished for it

> [{quoted}](name=AetherKingdom,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=PxFFoEvo,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-13T05:32:19.899+0000)
>
> thing is i prob wouldve still been banned had i not said a thing.

If you had not said anything at all you would not be in this situation.

Just re-read your log and even look at your reply to Zezockary. You told someone to hang themselves and you throw around the Autisim word like its an insult.

You know what you said is not right and I know that you know that you have displayed toxic behaviour in the chat log alone. And i also know that you very well know that it takes more then a single game of displaying this toxic behaviour to get you banned.

Moving forward you need to learn from this. Autisim is not something you should be throwing around as an insult. Its very rude and its not acceptable in this community which you are a part of. Even worse is telling people to commit suicide as that usually results in a quick ban as you have just discovered.

Reform begins with understanding that your attitude towards others is unacceptable. Once you realize that you can begin to look at this game in a new view.

Best of luck on your road to becoming a better person.

> [{quoted}](name=LuluxAnnieYuri,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=PxFFoEvo,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-13T05:47:20.425+0000)
>
> If you had not said anything at all you would not be in this situation.
> 
> Just re-read your log and even look at your reply to Zezockary. You told someone to hang themselves and you throw around the Autisim word like its an insult.

Yea, when people start spamming to report me when I ping off baron because we have no tank and their team is is ready to contest it and waiting in their blue jg, i get a little bit fucking mad. And yes, I do use autism like an insult, because I consider autistic people ( or any form of mental retardation) or with birth defects to be second class. 
> You know what you said is not right and I know that you know that you have displayed toxic behaviour in the chat log alone. And i also know that you very well know that it takes more then a single game of displaying this toxic behaviour to get you banned.

I knew that baron call was not right too but my team didnt care about that. People love to get to low plat and think they know how to play this game. 

> Moving forward you need to learn from this. Autisim is not something you should be throwing around as an insult. Its very rude and its not acceptable in this community which you are a part of. Even worse is telling people to commit suicide as that usually results in a quick ban as you have just discovered.

> Reform begins with understanding that your attitude towards others is unacceptable. Once you realize that you can begin to look at this game in a new view.

and to be honest, i really do try to not say anything negative directly towards anyone. instead of saying " wow you are actually fucking garbage" i type ff or open mid instead. it's not until people talk shit about me directly that i get mad
> Best of luck on your road to becoming a better person.
Ever thought of sticking to single player games?

> [{quoted}](name=AetherKingdom,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=PxFFoEvo,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-13T06:11:25.372+0000)
>
> And yes, I do use autism like an insult, because I consider autistic people ( or any form of mental retardation) or with birth defects to be second class. 

People like you are trash. Full stop.
and I've been plenty toxic in some gaming sessions I take way too late into the night and come off with no ill effects.

> [{quoted}](name=AetherKingdom,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=PxFFoEvo,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-13T05:32:19.899+0000)
>
> thing is i prob wouldve still been banned had i not said a thing. thats how riot banning system works. retards who have no game sense report you for not being autistic and you get punished for it

Crazy, I've been using the chat system for almost 6 years at this point and I've yet to get punished.

Thats not how it works at all...

A report just flags the game for the automated system to review.

It would of saw.you didnt type and wernt 0/30 and nothing would of happened to you.

I got a warning once
Once

Man i hate this reddit style shit. 

Dont even know what post i was agreeing with.
You can sort the page differently if you didn't know. You can sort by popular comments or chronological and discussion view or some shit like that lol
He told an entire country to hang themselves that alone is enough.

http://www.gifwave.com/media/753552_parody-the-hangover-rain-man.gif?noredirect

After deep consideration and much calculation I have determined that the ban was legit.
